text: Auronzo di Cadore is a comune (municipality) in the province of Belluno (Cadore) in the Italian region of Veneto, located about north of Venice and about northeast of Belluno. The municipality of Auronzo di Cadore includes the mountain group of the Tre Cime di Lavaredo and Lake Misurina. The river Ansiei is dammed to make Santa Caterina Lake, which borders the town. ==Twin towns / Sister cities== * Lipari, Italy * Il√≥polis, Brazil ==References== ==Other websites== *Auronzo di Cadore history and guide Category:Settlements in Belluno
title: Auronzo di Cadore
